En.DRAGAPULT_PA1_TEXT_1: Reduces the duration of debuff effects inflicted on the user.
En.DRAGAPULT_BA1_TEXT_1: Each time damage is dealt to enemies, boosted basic attack gauge increases. When the boosted basic attack gauge is full (after 8 instances of damage), the Pokémon's basic attacks become boosted attacks. Boosted attacks deal increased damage and have an area-of-effect centered on the enemy they hit. The boosted basic attack gauge will begin decreasing rapidly if this Pokémon does not deal damage to enemies for 3s.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_ASTONISH_TEXT_1: Lets out a sound blast in a forward direction. The shout explodes when it hits an enemy or after traveling a set distance, dealing damage in an area and decreasing enemy movement speed by 30% for 2s.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DRAGON_BREATH_TEXT_1: Exhales a mighty gust in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. The gust also leaves the ground burning for 3s. Enemies in this area take damage-over-time and have their movement speed decreased for a short time. If this move is used while the user is flying with Dragon Dance, the mighty gust is exhaled along Dragon Dance's flight path, dealing damage to enemies in the area and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DRAGON_BREATH_TEXT_2: Deals increased damage and increases the slow to 45% for 2s.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_SHADOW_BALL_TEXT_1: Hurls a shadowy blob in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and applying a mark to them. When marked enemies are hit by Dragapult, they receive additional damage. After the fourth time the marked enemy is hit, the mark is removed, and additional damage is dealt and the user recovers 10% of max HP. After using this move, the user moves a short distance in a designated direction.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_QUICK_ATTACK_TEXT_1: Dashes in the designated direction, increasing basic attack speed by 40% for 2s.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DRAGON_DANCE_TEXT_1: Flies in a circular pattern in the designated direction. While flying, continuously deal damage to nearby enemies with auto attacks that deal 10% less damage but have increased attack speed by 200%. This fly pattern takes 3.5s to complete. If this move is used again while the user is flying, the user stops flying and moves a short distance in the designated direction. If the user knocks out an enemy, this move's cooldown is reset. If the user assists in a knock out, this move's cooldown is reduced by half. When this move is used, Dragon Breath's cooldown is reset.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DRAGON_DANCE_TEXT_2: While the user is flying, attacks gain an additional 25% lifesteal.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_PHANTOM_FORCE_TEXT_1: The user enters stealth and has 15% increased movement speed for 6s. While the user is in stealth, the boosted basic attack gauge increases. When stealth ends, Dragapult's basic attack speed is increased by 85% for 3s. After this move is learned, if the user knocks out an enemy, this move's cooldown is reset and Dragapult's Attack is increased by 6 until the end of battle. This Attack increase can stack up to 8 times.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_PHANTOM_FORCE_TEXT_2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 0.5s when the user deals damage to enemies with basic or boosted attacks.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DREEP_AND_DESTROY_TEXT_1: Launches two Dreepy and each deals damage to different enemies in the area-of-effect. The lower the enemy's remaining HP is, the more damage the Dreepy deal. If there is only one target in the area, both Dreepy target that enemy and deal damage to them. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. Dreepy may be fired once every 2s. Against Wild Pokemon: The additional damage from missing HP is capped at 1200.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DREEP_AND_DESTROY_TAG_TEX: Also deals 10% of enemy missing HP.
En.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DREEP_AND_DESTROY_TEXT_2: Has an internal cooldown of 30s to activate Energy Amplifier; Has an internal cooldown of 60s to activate Buddy Barrier; 10% Max HP Shield, 10% Movement Speed for 3s

Cn.DRAGAPULT_PA1_TEXT_1: 受到能力下降效果影响时，缩短该效果的持续时间。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_BA1_TEXT_1: 每次对敌人造成伤害都会累积强化普通攻击计量槽，强化普通攻击计量槽全满时（在造成 8 次伤害后），普通攻击会变为强化普通攻击。强化普通攻击会造成更高的伤害，并变为以击中的敌人为中心的范围攻击。若在 3 秒内没有对敌人造成伤害，强化普通攻击计量槽将逐渐减少。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_ASTONISH_TEXT_1: 向前方发射音波。音波会在击中敌人或飞行一定距离后爆炸，对范围内的敌人造成伤害，并降低其移动速度 30%，持续时间 2 秒。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DRAGON_BREATH_TEXT_1: 向指定方向用力吐出气息进行攻击。对范围内的敌人造成伤害，并降低其移动速度 30%，持续时间 2 秒。此外，吐出的气息还会使地面持续灼烧 3 秒，对范围内的敌人造成持续伤害，并在短时间内降低其移动速度。如果在使用「龙之舞」飞行时使用此招式，则会配合「龙之舞」的飞行吐出气息，对范围内的敌人造成伤害，并在短时间内降低其移动速度。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DRAGON_BREATH_TEXT_2: 对敌人造成更高的伤害，并使其移动速度降低 45%，持续时间 2 秒。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_SHADOW_BALL_TEXT_1:
向指定方向投掷一团黑影，对接触到的的敌人造成伤害并赋予其标记。被赋予了标记的敌人，在被攻击后受到的伤害会增加。
    第 4 次攻击赋予了标记的敌人时会使标记消失，但会进一步提高伤害的增加量，同时回复自身最大体力的 10%。使用此招式后，使用者会向指定方向移动一小段距离。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_QUICK_ATTACK_TEXT_1: 向指定方向冲刺，并使攻击速度提升 40%，持续时间2秒。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DRAGON_DANCE_TEXT_1:
向指定方向绕圈飞行。在飞行期间，会持续使用普通攻击对周围的敌人造成伤害，造成的伤害降低 10%，但攻击速度提高 200%。这种飞行模式可持续 3.5 秒。若在飞行过程中再次使用此招式，则会停止飞行并向指定方向小幅移动。
    如果击倒敌人，此招式的间隔时间会重置。如果协助击倒，此招式的间隔时间减少一半。使用此招式时，「龙息」的间隔时间会重置。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DRAGON_DANCE_TEXT_2: 飞行期间的普通攻击额外获得 25% 的生命偷取。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_PHANTOM_FORCE_TEXT_1:
进入隐身状态，移动速度提高 15%，持续时间 6 秒。处于隐身状态期间会累积强化普通攻击计量槽。解除隐身状态时，普通攻击速度提高 85%，持续时间 3 秒。
    若击倒敌人，此招式的间隔时间将重置，并增加攻击力 6 点，直到战斗结束。此提高攻击的效果最多可叠加 8 次。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_PHANTOM_FORCE_TEXT_2: 使用普通攻击或强化普通攻击对敌人造成伤害时，此招式的间隔时间缩短 0.5 秒。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DREEP_AND_DESTROY_TEXT_1: 射出 2 只多龙梅西亚，对范围内的 2 个敌人。敌人的剩余体力越低，造成的伤害就越大。如果范围内只有 1 个敌人，则 2 只多龙梅西亚都以该敌人为目标并对其造成伤害。此招式最多保存次数为 2 次。多龙梅西亚可能每 2 秒发射一次。对野生宝可梦：损失体力造成的额外伤害上限为1200。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DREEP_AND_DESTROY_TAG_TEX: 还造成敌人已损失体力的 10%。
Cn.DRAGAPULT_MOVE_DREEP_AND_DESTROY_TEXT_2: 能量增幅器有 30 秒的内部间隔时间；救援屏障有 60 秒的内部间隔时间；10% 最大体力值护盾，在 3 秒内提高移动速度 10%。
Cn.Damage - Final Mark Proc: 伤害 - 末次暗影球标记
Cn.Damage - Additional (Same Target): 伤害 - 附加伤害（对同一目标）
